fields_of_interest: Competition, Customs, Environment, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: ERFA is following developments on the Rail Freight Corridors, the revision of the Eurovignette Directive, the revision of the Combined Transport Directive, discussions on the upcoming MFF revision, developments on new Rail freight noise requirement and many more issues that impact the rail freight business.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Expert Group on Land Transport Security#E02821#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=2821#Observer#C#Commission expert group on the technical pillar of the 4th Railway Package#E03430#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3430#Member#C#Working Group for Non Road Mobile Machinery (Emission from non road mobile machinery engines)#E01346#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=1346#Not a member#C#In-Service Monitoring of Non Road Mobile Machinery Engines
relevant_communication: ERFA publishes position papers and press releases related to EU activities or rail freight issues that are relevant for the European market. We also organise a public event once per year in Brussels to highlight key concerns.
goals__remit: ERFA's main objective is to improve the competitive environment for rail freight across Europe. We seek to improve the quality of rail service, reduce costs of rail and remove any remaining access barriers.
